house_listing.house_description: This condominium built in 1998 has 2 bedroom(s), 2 bath(s) , 2 car attached garage and approximately 1561 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room. Features include private pool, private spa, air conditioning.
house_listing.firm_name: Wimbish-Riteway Re Lic. Real Estate Broker
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Kitchen Island, Tennis Court(s), Walk-In Closet(s), Wet Bar
